trans-unit.source: Install MySQL on a virtual machine running OpenSUSE Linux in Azure
trans-unit.target: Install MySQL on a virtual machine running OpenSUSE Linux in Azure

trans-unit.source: [MySQL][MySQL] is a popular, open-source SQL database.
trans-unit.target: [MySQL][MySQL] is a popular, open-source SQL database.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial shows you how to create a virtual machine running OpenSUSE Linux, then install MySQL.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial shows you how to create a virtual machine running OpenSUSE Linux, then install MySQL.

trans-unit.source: Create a virtual machine running OpenSUSE Linux
trans-unit.target: Create a virtual machine running OpenSUSE Linux

trans-unit.source: Install and run MySQL on the virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Install and run MySQL on the virtual machine

trans-unit.source: For details about MySQL, see the [MySQL Documentation][MySQLDocs].
trans-unit.target: For details about MySQL, see the [MySQL Documentation][MySQLDocs].
